### Color Equality operator
</br>


#### Determines whether two colors are equal.

```csharp
public static bool operator ==(Color left, Color right)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| left | First color. |
| right | Second color. |

### Return Value

`true` if equal; otherwise `false`.
